This warwolf was given incalculable strength through horrific genetic manipulation. Its gentle nature was completely wiped out, and it now lives only to unleash destruction.
A massive flea that feeds on the blood of its enemies.
A sea-dwelling snake that attacks passing enemies with its sharp teeth.
An iron wolf with razor-sharp fangs that can penetrate any armor.
This steel-armored terror machine ruthlessly strikes down enemies with its giant katana.
Despite its small size, this monster has powerful jaws that can rip metal to shreds.
This one-eyed warrior bear is an aggressive hunter that strikes down its prey with the powerful swipes of its claws. No one can bear the brunt of his tremendously fast and heavy blows.
A large, spherical roach that attacks its enemies by rolling over them.
A high-performance jet fighter with power capsules for variable attack capabilities.
A masked monster that wields the most deadly of curses.
A very violent beast, it is always berserk. People say that they have never seen it silent.
A giant white shark with razor-sharp teeth.
This monster's tough hide deflects almost any attack.
A surface battle robot that was once used for sea warfare.
A monster that guards the entrance to the Netherworld.
A robot guard built to guard throne rooms, it is armed with homing missiles.
This human-shaped animal with wings is beautiful to watch but deadly in battle.
A haunted spirit of a falsely accused knight who wanders in search of truth and justice.
Confuses enemies with a noise that is harsh to the ears.
A very agile half-fish warrior known for its relentless attacks.
A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.
This slime apparently has some human genes in its genetic makeup.
This amphibian is strong on the attack, but leaves much to be desired when defending.
Tribute 2 monsters on your side of the field to increase your Life Points by 1000 points.
A log that attacks lost travelers in the forest. Originally a big tree, it was cut down and possessed by a wicked spirit.
Of all Insect fighters, he is the paragon of the Indestructible Insect Invaders, which only the elite of the elite can join. We can no longer ignore their unmatched battle prowess.
A huge turtle that is often mistaken for an island.
An almost invisible, semi-transparent jellyfish that drifts in the sea.
A huge monster in the shape of a hippopotamus. The sneezing from his gigantic body is so fierce that people mistake it for a hurricane.
A lady warrior armed with sword and shield, she floats lightly and stings sharply.
A huge bee with exceptional strength that's particularly dangerous in a swarm.
A man-hunter with powerful arms that can crush boulders
A vicious, fire-breathing dragon whose wicked flame corrupts the souls of its victims.
A very vicious stag beetle that goes for the head.

Card Name: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
Card Text: A genie of the lamp that is at the beck and call of its master.
A territorial electronic monster that guards its own domain.
A minor dragon incapable of breathing fire.
This spirit emerges from the mystic lamp and obeys the wishes of its summoner.
A very beautiful dragon covered with sapphire. It does not like fights, but has incredibly high attack power.
He used to be a normal dog who played around in a park, but was corrupted by the powers of darkness.
This creature casts a spell of terror and confusion just before attacking its enemies.
A sorcerer blessed by lunar light with powers far beyond mortal comprehension.
A monster disguised as a treasure chest that is known to attack the unwary adventurer.
Legendary swordmaster Masaki is a veteran of over 100 battles.
A deadly duo consisting of a beast master and its loyal servant.
A wandering Kyonshee searching for a strong rival to defeat. They say he was known as the master of all martial arts.
A hunter that relentlessly pursues its target by order of the Machine King.
With its sound-baffling armor and gargantuan jaws, this primeval predator's phosphorescence was the only possible pardon for its primitive prey.
"Check THIS out!"
This monster has four different masks for four different attacks.
A machine soldier that was developed as a guard. It is made of rust-proof metal.
Many have fallen victim to this lunar warrior's crescent pike.
Mysterious living matter that suddenly appeared from a different dimension. Its attack paralyzes the target's nerves, and causes intense hallucinations.
Nothing can stop the mad attack of this powerful creature.
Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.
A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.
A huge bug-like monster said to come from another planet. It gathers in swarms.
A dimensional drifter who not only practices sorcery, but is also a sword and martial arts master.
A Ninja dog who has mastered extreme Ninjutsu. Through hard training, it learned the technique to metamorphose into a human being.

No one shall ever know the truth behind ;; That fateful day. Artorigus went forth ;; To where the brilliant sword didst lay. ;; 'Twas the first of many feats so great, ;; A legend through and through. We sing of him, ;; Artorigus, the Noble and the brave. ;; -From the Tales of the Noble Knights
If this monster is Normal Summoned, destroy this card. If your opponent controls any monster, decrease the ATK of this card by 200 points for each monster on your opponent's side of the field.
An ogre possessed by the powers of the dark. Few can withstand its rapid charge.
An armored tank possessed by a fiend that will pursue enemies until they're crushed.
A one-eyed giant that serves the "Dark Ruler Ha Des", it skewers its enemies with its sharp horn, shattering them to pieces.
An all-terrain armored vehicle armed with a heavy-duty machine gun.
With skin tinged bluish-white, this strange creature is a fearsome sight to behold.
A legendary monster that dwells secretly in the mountains, fighting with the harpies over hunting grounds. A single wingbeat is said to cause the fiercest of storms.
This creature is shielded with a tough hide of hair and is excellent at defending itself.
While the king is away, this queen protects his throne with a mighty defense.
This knight catches her opponents off guard, dominating them with swift yet graceful attacks.
A mermaid archer that hides in a protective shell, waiting for the right moment to strike.
His renowned athletic physique has made him famous with the populace of Dark World. They call him "Iron Wall Renge" because no one can break through his incredible defenses.
The Commander of Machine-Types, he serves the Machine King. He is famous for the way he controls his troops.
A deadly doll gifted with mystical power, it is particularly powerful when attacking against dark forces.
A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.
This normally gentle dinosaur enjoys relaxing in its nest in the prairies. If it becomes angered, it turns terribly ferocious.
A warrior who defends the world of the Sea of Darkness. He prides himself on his fighting prowess both on the ground and, of course, in the water.
A merman warrior dedicated to defending the ocean against anyone who would defile it.
This monster employs the powers of both Light and Darkness.
The peacemaker among monsters.
Wherever there are shadows, you'll find the "C" Squad! Their hidden flying abilities let them confront the giants on equal terms!
A lost dog that wandered off 1000 years ago. He's still waiting for his master to come for him.
A pirate ship that appears out of the mist and sinks any seagoing vessels.
This monster swoops down and attacks with a rain of knives stored in its wings.
With eyes like a hawk and a flying speed exceeding Mach 5, this monster is a master of the sky.
A ferocious animal that sleeps all day. Sometimes it's better to let Sleeping Lions lie.
A slave of the dark arts, this sorcerer is a master of death-dealing spells.
The soul of a tiger that is said to devour human souls. He is a famous soul that you wouldn't want to run into in a dark alley.
A living wonder of mystery.
A Space Mambo floating in the vast universe. This living relic was found in the ruins of a super civilization on Alphard 4.
This wise spirit dwells in books, using its accumulated knowledge to defeat enemies.
A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.
A member of a race of sea serpents that freely travels through the sea.
This bird is known far and wide as a harbinger of doom.
A mysterious temple of skulls and bones that pulls in unsuspecting enemies.
Known as a swamp dweller, this creature is a minion of the dark forces.

Card Name: The Dragon Dwelling in the Cave
Card Text: A huge dragon dwelling in a cave. It is horrible when it gets angry, although it is usually quiet. It is said to preserve certain treasures.
Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 of your monsters destroyed in battle during this turn to your hand.

Card Name: The Gross Ghost of Fled Dreams
Card Text: This monster feeds on the dreams of an unwary sleeper, dragging the victim into eternal slumber.
Wearing odd fashions, this gentleman is very fickle. He sometimes saves people and at other times commits crimes.
A portrait cursed by the artist, it is said to bring ill fortune to anyone who owns it.
A monster with a head of poison snakes. One look from this monster can turn an opponent to stone.
A stone monument from Easter Island that launches laser blasts from its rock-hewn lips.
A three-headed nocturnal monster that is absolutely ruthless when fighting.
A fast and powerful axe-wielding beast-warrior.
This monster captures other fish with its long tongue and sucks the energy out of them.
An alligator monster straight from the cartoons.
This fiend passes judgment on enemies that are locked in coffins.
This creature attacks with electromagnetic waves.
A tiger encased in a protective shell that attacks with razor-sharp fangs.
A powerful monster whose two heads attack as one.
Capable of firing cannonballs from its mouth for long-range attacks, this creature is particularly effective in mountain battles.
Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.
This ace fighter is unbeatable in a dogfight. It combines with other monsters to launch an array of encircling attacks.
Hard scales cover all parts of this gigantic cobra. It hunts by shooting large amounts of venom, but because of its large size, its attack pattern is easily predicted.
This monster can call forth sudden torrents of battering rain.
This wicked Beast-Warrior does every horrid thing imaginable and loves it! His axe bears the marks of his countless victims.
The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.
A wandering warrior who seeks the sanctuary where he can gain the power of the Archlords. To escape the temptation of evil fiends, he fights solo day by day.
This monster swamps an opponent with an almost endless supply of water.
Transforms the water overflowing from a jar into attacking dragons.
Attacks from the sky with a whip-like tail.

Card Name: Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1
Card Text: A dragon commonly found guarding mountain fortresses. Its signature attack is a sweeping dive from out of the blue.

Card Name: Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #2
Card Text: This creature's wings are capable of generating tornadoes.
Dressed in a night-black tuxedo, this creature presides over death.
Once it has started battle, this monster attacks fiercely and cannot stop.
Once this monster wraps itself around a victim, there is no escape.
A fish with arms?
A monster with a mighty cannon barrel, it is able to integrate its attacks. It attacks in many ways by combining and separating with other monsters.
A female X-Saber Warrior, known for her graceful attacks and calm decision making in battle. Her ambition is merciless, and strikes fear in the hearts of her enemies.
A treasure box containing a monster that attacks any unwary bandit.
The two are so close ;; The die and return to life ;; Inseparable
The name of this illustrious knight is known by all residents of Dark World. He never oppresses the commoners.

Card Text: A mysterious engraved Hieratic relic. It was thought to be a simple stone, but it was actually infused with the power of a sun-wielding dragon. Ages passed, and the power of the relic grew and grew until it finally shone like the sun itself.

A ferocious serpent that was being hunted by Atlanteans. Battle-weary and ragged, it came upon an ancient light, and gained new strength for its battle. With its increased power, it launched an invasion of enemy territory with a renewed assault.
It's a snowfield-dwelling, giant-ear-sporting, super-acoustic, snowball-shaped mutant dragon! There's no way anybody can escape.
An unstoppable savage that carries Millennium Items.
When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced.
All data crushed by this network warrior's hammer is irretrievably compressed.
An unworthy dragon with three sharp horns sprouting from its head.
